title: Insurance rules make it harder to treat opioid use disorder

title_detail.value: Insurance rules make it harder to treat opioid use disorder

summary: Insurance industry cost-control measures may be worsening the nation's opioid epidemic by limiting access to a key medication that treats addiction, according to experts.

summary_detail.value: Insurance industry cost-control measures may be worsening the nation's opioid epidemic by limiting access to a key medication that treats addiction, according to experts.
